comment._content: The buildings (or some of them) apparently still existed until recently but had been abandoned. See www.damnedct.com/remington-arms-bridgeport/ The page has a Google map -- images from 2008 show the dilapidated plant clearly.

comment._content: But in 2010, partial demolition began after a fire. See www.ctpost.com/news/article/Demolition-of-Remington-Arms-... August, 2012 saw another fire. www.nbcconnecticut.com/news/local/Fire-at-Old-Remington-A...
